Accordion Variations

Bordered Style

Nexus Admin is a high-performance, developer-friendly dashboard template designed for modern web applications. It features a unique dark neon aesthetic and is built with Tailwind CSS and Alpine.js.
Simply clone the repository, run npm install, and then npm run dev to start the development server.
Yes! Nexus is built with a mobile-first approach. Every component is optimized for mobile, tablet, and desktop screens with fluid layouts.

Flush Style

We use code splitting and lazy loading to ensure the dashboard remains fast even as your data grows.
Nexus comes with pre-configured Axios hooks and Fetch utilities for easy integration with any REST or GraphQL API.
Easily change the primary accent colors through Tailwind's configuration file to match your brand identity.
